page.title: 11COMMUNICATION IN BETHERSDEN
page.content: BETHERSDEN IS A CLOSE-KNIT COMMUNITY WITH GOOD NEIGHBOUR,MEALS ON WHEELS AND HOME HELP SCHEMES FOR THE ELDERLY AND INFIRM.THE GOOD NEIGHBOUR OR WARD -EN CALLS EACH MORNING ON THE ELDERLY AND HOUSEBOUND TO SEE THEY ARE WELL.A LINK GROUP PROVIDES A COMPREHENSIVE SERVICE FOR THOSE IN NEED OF ARRANGING TRANSPORT FOR HOSPITAL OR DOCTOR APPOINTMENTS,COLLECTION OF SHOPPING OR THE EXCHANGE OF LIBRARY BOOKS.MEMBERS WILL ALSO COLLECT PRESCRIPTIONS.FOR THOSE WHO ENJOY READING,THE MOBILE LIBRARY VISITS THE VILLAGE WEEKLY,THE PARISH MAGAZINE INFORMS US OF VILLAGE EVENTS,WHILE LOCAL NEWSPAPERS,TWO OF WHICH ARE FREE,KEEP US IN TOUCH WITH THE SURROUNDING DISTRICT. MAIL IS DELIVERED TWICE DAILY ON WEEKDAYS AND ONCE ON SATURDAY MORNINGS.THOSE PEOPLE WITHOUT TELEPHONES ARE ABLE TO USE A PAY-PHONE IN THE VILLAGE STREET.
